content:
**notes from pattern **
poncho is worked from the neck down beads are attached on a ribbon in groups our 36 ribbon had 128 groups of beads tack ends of ribbon together **yarn requirements ** moda dea prima eyelash 77yd/50g
4 balls one size fits most women **other items needed **
36 trendy trimmings beads sewing needle and thread yarn needle this pattern was previously free online 1 but the moda dea website is no longer available 1 http //www modadea com/patterns/lm0149 htm
